name: postybirb-plus
description: PostyBirb is an application that helps artists post art and other multimedia to multiple websites more quickly..

scripts.install:commons: cd commons && npm install && npm run build
scripts.release:windows: node create-signer.js && npm run make && cd electron-app && yarn run release:windows
scripts.release:linux: node create-signer.js && npm run make && cd electron-app && yarn run release:linux
scripts.release:osx: npm run make && cd electron-app && yarn run release:osx
scripts.ci:commons: cd commons && npm ci --no-audit && npm run build

author: Michael DiCarlo
